import{useState}from"react";import'./style.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const[mobileMenuActive,setMobileMenuActive]=useState(false);const toggleMobileMenu=()=>{setMobileMenuActive(!mobileMenuActive);};const closeMobileMenu=()=>{setMobileMenuActive(false);};const menuItems=[{mid:1,label:'Home',link:'#home'},{mid:2,label:'Products',link:'#products'},{mid:3,label:'Process',link:'#process'},{mid:4,label:'Industries',link:'#industries'},{mid:5,label:'About',link:'#about'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:" ".concat(mobileMenuActive?'ad-mobile-nav-open':''),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:menuItems.map(menuList=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{onClick:closeMobileMenu,href:menuList.link,children:menuList.label})},menuList.mid))})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{onClick:toggleMobileMenu,className:"ad-menu-toggle",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"bar1",className:"bar"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"bar2",className:"bar"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"bar3",className:"bar"})]})]});};export default Navbar;
